2012 IA 4562A
Iowa Depreciation Adjustment Schedule
www.iowa.gov/tax
Iowa Department of Revenue
Enclose this form with your Iowa income tax return.

41-105a (09/20/12)
PART I - Computation of Iowa depreciation adjustment
PART  II - Disposition adjustments             
  
If you have not 
sold or disposed of any bonus depreciation or section 179 property, skip to Part III of this form.
I
f you have 
disposed of bonus depreciation or section 179 property, and an Iowa depreciation adjustment applied to this property in a prior year, continue to Part II.
